translation:
I have been doing without much news, despite having great headaches yesterday and today.

Tomorrow I suppose our electoral work will end, and if possible I intend to return on Friday or Saturday. A hug to our Mingote and Bernardino, whom I have missed a lot and I wish I could already embrace my Mingote.

Recommendations to the comadre, compadres, and everyone in general.
